nodes.text: The Hypergate Operation Center was the primary control center for the Grand Hypergate on the planet Asation. Located south of the Quadrilateral Forum and west of the hypergate itself, it was ran by the Master Control artificial intelligence, which was corrupted during Kephess's raid on Asation. A hidden section of the center was called the Purple Obtuse Repository.
The Harmonious Habitat first appears in the Operation "Terror From Beyond" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
